projects.title: Ecity
projects.description: Application developed in a project for students of a technical school, it allows the population to insert problems related to their daily lives on the map and thus make them visible in real time for the visualization of public services. Available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ecity.alice.project.ecity.

projects.title: My Riddles
projects.description: Application developed for education professionals to create puzzles for their students, with ranking and updating in real time. Available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cria.sphinxroom

projects.title: Hi CRIA
projects.description: Application developed for English language teachers, with gamification structure. Available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cria.agora

projects.title: The magic journal
projects.description: Website created for children's teachers to teach the subject of History in an integrated way with other subjects. It works like a journal that receives data and returns graphs. Available at https://odiariomagico.com.br/

projects.title: Portal CRIA
projects.description: Website under development. It will function as an online portal for employees of the Department of Education of ParaÃ­ba to carry out training, monitor school data, post news and create their own portfolio pages.
